column4: is there anyone who could help me save my system in rescue mode
i have no idea what the issue is
k - you are in rescue mode - why?

i have no idea. when i rebooted my computer i was presented with a text based installer. it looks like the mini installer. i chose rescue mode because it is the closes i can get at this point to booting my current install.
so reading between the lines you couldn't boot so put in a live cd?
where does the installer come into it pls?
I think that is the grub boot menu then
so you are not running a live cd but have the option to install, is that right?
I don't know how you got that on the boot menu then - might be quicker to reinstall - unless someone else has a clue
open the cd player just to check pls
